DOC.brief_summary: To compare safety efficacy 2 different bowel cleansing preparation prior colonoscopy adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: F38-27 : An Evaluation 2 Different Bowel Cleansing Preparations Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female outpatient undergo colonoscopy routinely accept indication : 2 . At least 18 year age 3 . Otherwise good health , determine physical exam medical history 4 . If female , childbearing potential , use acceptable form birth control 5 . Negative urine pregnancy test screening , applicable 6 . In Investigator 's judgment , subject mentally competent provide inform consent participate study 1 . Subjects know suspected ileus , gastrointestinal obstruction , gastric retention , bowel perforation , toxic colitis , toxic megacolon 2 . Subjects impaired consciousness predisposes pulmonary aspiration 3 . Subjects undergo colonoscopy foreign body removal decompression 4 . Subjects preexist electrolyte disturbance , dehydration , secondary use diuretic 5 . Subjects take drug may affect electrolyte level exception routine diuretic 6 . Subjects know clinically significant electrolyte abnormality hypernatremia , hyperphosphatemia , hypokalemia , hypocalcemia 7 . Subjects pregnant lactating , intend become pregnant study 8 . Subjects childbearing potential refuse pregnancy test 9 . Subjects allergic preparation component 10 . Subjects , opinion Investigator , include study reason , include inability follow study procedure 11 . Subjects participate investigational clinical , surgical , drug , device study within past 30 day
